miasma.translation[0].definitions[0].def: dirty air or a thick unpleasant mist that smells bad
miasma.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He looked up at me through a miasma of cigarette smoke.
A foul miasma lay over the town.
miasma.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an evil influence or feeling that seems to surround a person or place
miasma.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The miasma of defeat hung over them.
